name: Covid shopper
description:
A Beta build of a game I've been working off and on with since February, I first got the idea when all the panic buying started and I thought "hey people like buying stuff, and there are competitive buyers so why not make a game out of it" and i did.

I would like as much feed back as possible, I started a discord group find it here https://discord.gg/4Vm7s9 I would like any and all tips you think might improve the game. This includes items, names of items, design details, layout, UI, and basically every other part of the game.

The game is currently in at most beta 1 so expect many changes to come, hopefully only things that make the game better with your help

I did forget to add the controls to the game, they are wasd for movement, mouse to look around, E to "buy," Left Shift to run, Left Control to crouch, and space to jump.
